Sentencas: Surface modification of electrode materials could effectively enhance catalytic activity and stability for low temperature solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Lithium zirconate coated LiNi0.8Co0.15Al0.05O2 as a high-performance electrode material for advanced fuel cells

Sentencas: In this paper, LiNi0.8Co0.15Al0.05O2 (NCAL), material with 1 wt % Li2ZrO3 (LZO) surface coating were successfully synthesized by a simple wet chemical method.
Titulo: Lithium zirconate coated LiNi0.8Co0.15Al0.05O2 as a high-performance electrode material for advanced fuel cells

Sentencas: The crystal structure, surface morphology and electrochemical properties of the modified NCAL materials were investigated by X-ray diffraction, scanning electron microscopy and photoelectron spectroscopy.
Titulo: Lithium zirconate coated LiNi0.8Co0.15Al0.05O2 as a high-performance electrode material for advanced fuel cells

Sentencas: The obtained results showed that the NCAL coated with LZO exhibited superior electrochemical performance.
Titulo: Lithium zirconate coated LiNi0.8Co0.15Al0.05O2 as a high-performance electrode material for advanced fuel cells

Sentencas: According to the EIS results, the polarization resistance of the 1 wt % LZO-modified NCAL based fuel cell at 550 degrees C was only 0.303 Omega cm(2), respectively, which were much lower than pure NCAL (1.33 Omega cm(2)).
Titulo: Lithium zirconate coated LiNi0.8Co0.15Al0.05O2 as a high-performance electrode material for advanced fuel cells

Sentencas: The results show that the LZO surfaced coated NCAL could be a promising anode material towards high-performance advanced fuel cells.
Titulo: Lithium zirconate coated LiNi0.8Co0.15Al0.05O2 as a high-performance electrode material for advanced fuel cells

Sentencas: Combined with XRD and XPS analysis, it can be inferred that: the surface modification of LZO did not affect the structure of the raw material, and during the test, LZO enabled the effective distribution of the oxygen vacancies on the surface of the material, which accelerated the catalytic activity of the electrode during the discharge process.
Titulo: Lithium zirconate coated LiNi0.8Co0.15Al0.05O2 as a high-performance electrode material for advanced fuel cells
